channel.title: [PI] Fishing Help
channel.description:
Ok so only one option of my fishing spots work so if it's a cage and harpoon only the harpoon option works or if it is net and bait only net works. Can anyone help me?
- P.S. I did use the search bar and I did use google.

item.title: [PI] Fishing Help
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

Thanks guys i got it to work still needs some tweaking though.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Fishing Help
item.dc:creator: @_synchronized ~synchronized
item.description:
@_synchronized wrote:

If you want both options to work then do what i said, assign the actions under the correct method in the ActionHandler class.
e.g firstClickNpc, secondClickNpc.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Fishing Help
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

He is asking for both parts of the spot to work. Example: Cage > for lobsters, and Harpoon > for tuna/swordfish but on th same spot.

All you have to do is create a second little piece of code under your current fishing spot code to allow it to work. If you check some other bases like Hybrid PvP, they have it already added.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Fishing Help
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

~synchronized:

Well as you know the fishing spots are npcs, get the correct npc id and assign it under the right action handler method, either first npc click or second npc click. To be honest i dont quite understand what you are asking for…

I’m asking how to make both fishing spot options work because right now only one of the options work out of each fishing spot.

Read full topic
